title: Drop v14+ styles
message:
Drop v14+ styles

To quote Chris Banes (https://chris.banes.me/2014/10/17/appcompat-v21/):

For apps which already have existing appcompat setups, this means that you should remove your v14+ themes which re-set the same values in the android namespace.

title: Don't just check for equals, but use compareTo
message:
Don't just check for equals, but use compareTo

This way the anchor can be used for all channels, even if the timestamp
does not match exactly. Otherwise we would always scroll to the bottom,
which is not desired.
